Author: LolitaJane
Text: I have a hard time stopping days-long b/p sometimes because I feel that way.  I find it somewhat helpful to remind myself that a new day is a *new day*, and that I can't change yesterday, so it's not helpful to keep thinking about it.  I also find it helpful to drink lots of tea and broth: the heat and fullness of it helps me feel the urge to binge less intensely.
